0.3.name: wordpress/ixml
0.3.description: This plugin allows creation of XML sitemaps for submission to Google. It adds a small widget box in the admin panel when you edit or create posts and pages, that allows exclusion from the sitemap file. A special thanks to bestwebsoft for their awesome plugin called google-sitemap-plugin
